name: The Creator - Mix Elements to Create New Items!
name_original: The Creator - Mix Elements to Create New Items!
description:
The Creator - Welcome to the world teeming with challenges, imaginations and surprises to discover!

You are the creator and controller of this game! Given 4 basic elements at first, and then you can mix them to create more and more advanced ones. Come on! Tons of new and interesting elements await their intelligent creator!

KEY FEATURES:
- Intuitive one-click gameplay
- Start with 4 basic elements
- Mix elements to create advanced items
- Play and share elements with friends
- Sync your progress between devices
- Simple and minimalistic user interaction design
- Lively music and sound

Enjoy a fascinating journey of discovering and creating!
